name: Infernoid Tierra
text:
"Infernoid Onuncu" + "Infernoid Devyaty" + 1 or more "Infernoid" monsters
When this card is Fusion Summoned, you can: Apply these effects, in sequence, depending on the number of Fusion Materials with different names used for this card's Summon;
â—? 3 or more: Each player sends 3 cards from their Extra Deck to the Graveyard.
â—? 5 or more: Each player sends the top 3 cards from their Deck to the Graveyard.
â—? 8 or more: Each player returns up to 3 of their banished cards to the Graveyard.
â—? 10 or more: Each player sends their entire hand to the Graveyard.
